TopicTitle: Poll is out! Vote for a new series on ycg! Poll closes very soon! Vote now!

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, i've posted this to advertise my YouChooseGaming (YCG) YouTube Channel.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I've created a poll for all of you (who haven't already voted) to vote for a new series I can start on straw poll! Wouldn't you like to have a series you wanted to see for a longgg time?

Straw Poll: http://strawpoll.me/2120777.

I wonder why YouTubers rarely make polls for this purpose...

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Updates:

I have created a new Twitter account: @KSP_YCG

Google+ page: https://plus.google.com/105719764347719713080/posts/p/pub

Realatively new website w/videos, announcements, and more at: https://sites.google.com/site/kspycggaming/

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Latest Video: YCG channel announcements

This video includes other things you may want to know and see, like our brand new intro and outro!

YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYVGhtBPL1bWG7V8UyLC93g

Videos from now on will be ad-free!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your comments WILL be read GUARANTEED and (whenever needing one) answered! Other YouTubers just sit there and read them, but don't respond: they leave you in the dark, they just move on and read someone else's comment and then make a video, but they won't take your suggestion or even say: NOPE! I have the time and resources to read your comments and (whenever needing one) a response!
